posts.post_content:
Redfern - Series 1 - Columbia SGC 20 (creases) 
Jones - Series 1 - Columbia SGC 40 

Some history:
Dr. James A. Redfearn, pitcher, b. 8/15/82 d. 10/1/75 played at U. of Georgia with a career mark of 18‐0‐1, set a Bulldog record on April 9, 1908 by striking out 21 Alabama hitters, turned down an offer from the Detroit Tigers to study medicine, released from Columbia 5/1/10, signed w/Greenville Spinners 5/2/10, member of Georgia State Hall of Fame.

Terrell Jones, pitcher, signed out of U. of South Carolina on 3/30/10, son of SC Comptroller General, Col. Adolphus Jones, released 4/26/10.

Prices include shipping. Paypal gift, check or MO.
